site.title: Pauch - Premium Nicotine Pouches

items.question: What are nicotine pouches?
items.answer: They are a tobacco-free product containing nicotine, food additives, and flavorings. They don't require burning and produce no smoke or unpleasant odor.

items.question: How do I choose the right strength?
Is this legal in Moldova?
items.answer: Currently, the product is legal as an alternative nicotine-containing product. We strictly adhere to the 18+ age restriction.

items.question: How fast is delivery in Chisinau?
items.answer: We deliver orders within 30-60 minutes after confirmation via Telegram (also depends on the area and workload). During evening hours and holidays, times may vary slightly.

items.question: Do I need to show ID?
items.answer: Yes, the courier may request a document confirming you are of legal age (18+). We do not sell products to minors.

items.question: How do I place an order?
items.answer: Simply click the 'Order in Telegram' button. Our manager will instantly contact you to clarify the details.

items.question: Do you offer pickup?
items.answer: We operate as an online store with fast delivery to save your time.

shipping.title: Shipping & Payment
shipping.deliveryText: We deliver within 30-60 minutes in the city center. Other areas within 1-2 hours.
shipping.paymentText: Cash on delivery or bank transfer. Payment details provided upon order confirmation.
shipping.areasText: We currently deliver to all areas within the city limits.

about.title: About Us
about.text: We are a trusted supplier of premium nicotine pouches. Our mission is to provide authentic, high-quality products with fast and discreet delivery.
about.authenticityText: All products are sourced directly from official distributors and come with original packaging.

ageGate.title: Age Verification
ageGate.message: You must be 18 years or older to access this website. Nicotine products are intended for adult use only.

telegram.prefill:
Hi, I want to order:

Product: {product}
Strength: {strength}mg
Quantity: ___

Delivery area: ___

strengthFinder.title: Find Your Strength
strengthFinder.subtitle: Answer a few questions to get a personalized starting recommendation
strengthFinder.disclaimer: This tool provides general guidance only and is not medical advice. Individual responses to nicotine vary. If unsure, start with a lower strength.
strengthFinder.caution: Since you don't currently use nicotine, we recommend starting with the lowest strength available. Nicotine can cause dependence. Consider whether this is right for you.

questions.text: What is your current nicotine use?
How would you describe your typical cravings?

options.label: Mild — easy to ignore or delay
Strong — hard to ignore for long

questions.text: How often would you like to use nicotine throughout the day?
How sensitive are you to nicotine or stimulants like caffeine?

options.label: Very sensitive — small amounts affect me strongly
Somewhat sensitive — I notice effects easily
High tolerance — I need more to feel effects

questions.text: What kind of experience are you looking for?

low.title: Low Strength (4-6mg)
low.explanation: Based on your answers, a low-strength pouch is a good starting point. This level offers a gentle nicotine experience with minimal intensity, ideal for building comfort before adjusting.

medium.title: Medium Strength (8-12mg)
medium.explanation: A medium-strength pouch should match your needs well. This level provides a balanced, noticeable effect without being overwhelming — suitable for most regular users.

strong.title: Strong (14-18mg)
strong.explanation: Based on your experience and preferences, a strong pouch is likely to satisfy your needs. This level delivers a pronounced effect suited to experienced nicotine users.

extra.title: Extra Strong (20mg+)
extra.explanation: Your answers suggest you have significant nicotine experience and tolerance. Extra-strong pouches provide maximum intensity — recommended only for heavy, experienced users.
